" Oh ! [I]1609-her was demented , dreaming of wild , impossible things , recalling men who had set [[their]1608-he wives]926-their wives free , [we]2109-we have heard of such things . "[1609-her]

" Yes , [we]2109-we have heard of such things . "[1609-her]

" [I]1609-her came back full of vague , mad intentions . And when [I]1609-her got [here]1819-here "[1609-her]

" When [you]1617-you got [here]1819-here [you]1617-you never came near [me]1616-she ! "[1616-she] [She]1616-she was still caressing [his]1617-you cheek .

" [I]1609-her realized what a cur [I]1609-her was to dream of such a thing , even if [you]1617-you had been willing . "[1609-her]

[She]1616-she took [his]1617-you face between [her]1616-she hands and looked into it as if [she]1616-she would never withdraw [her]1616-she eyes more . [She]1616-she kissed [him]1617-you on the forehead , the eyes , the cheeks , and the lips .

" [You]1617-you have been [a very , very foolish boy]2112-a very , very foolish boy , wasting [your]1617-you time dreaming of impossible things when [you]1617-you speak of [Mr. Pontellier]49-mr. pontellier setting [me]1616-she free ! [I]1616-she am no longer one of [Mr. Pontellier]49-mr. pontellier 's possessions to dispose of or not . [I]1616-she give [myself]1616-she where [I]1616-she choose . If [he]49-mr. pontellier were to say , Here , [Robert]53-robert , take [her]1618-madame ratignolle 's servant and be happy ; [she]1618-madame ratignolle 's servant is [yours]53-robert , ' [I]1616-she should laugh at [you]53-robert both . "[1616-she]

[His]1617-you face grew a little white . " What do [you]129-celestine mean ? "[1617-you] [he]1617-you asked .

There was a knock at the door . [Old Celestine]129-celestine came in to say that [[Madame Ratignolle]62-madame ratignolle 's servant]1618-madame ratignolle 's servant had come around the back way with a message that [Madame]62-madame ratignolle had been taken sick and begged [Mrs. Pontellier]52-mrs. pontellier to go to [her]62-madame ratignolle immediately .

" Yes , yes , "[115-edna] said [Edna]115-edna , rising ; " [I]115-edna promised . Tell [her]1618-madame ratignolle 's servant yes to wait for [me]115-edna . [I]115-edna 'll go back with [her]1618-madame ratignolle 's servant . "[115-edna]

" Let [me]53-robert walk over with [you]115-edna , "[53-robert] offered [Robert]53-robert .

" No , "[115-edna] [she]115-edna said ; " [I]115-edna will go with [the servant]2113-the servant . "[115-edna] [She]115-edna went into [[her]115-edna room]224-her room to put on [her]115-edna hat , and when [she]115-edna came in again [she]115-edna sat once more upon the sofa beside [him]53-robert . [He]53-robert had not stirred . [She]115-edna put [her]115-edna arms about [his]53-robert neck .

" Good - by , [my]53-robert sweet [Robert]53-robert . Tell [me]53-robert good - by . "[53-robert] [He]53-robert kissed [her]115-edna with a degree of passion which had not before entered into [his]53-robert caress , and strained [her]115-edna to [him]53-robert .

" [I]115-edna love [you]53-robert , "[115-edna] [she]115-edna whispered , " only [you]53-robert ; [no one]312-no one but [you]53-robert . It was [you]53-robert who awoke [me]115-edna last summer out of a life - long , stupid dream . Oh ! [you]53-robert have made [me]115-edna so unhappy with [your]53-robert indifference . Oh ! [I]115-edna have suffered , suffered ! Now [you]53-robert are here [we]2115-we shall love [each other]183-each other , [[my]115-edna [Robert]53-robert]2117-my robert . [We]2115-we shall be everything to [each other]183-each other . Nothing else in [the world]281-the world is of any consequence . [I]115-edna must go to [[my]115-edna friend]1911-my friend ; but [you]53-robert will wait for [me]115-edna ? No matter how late ; [you]53-robert will wait for [me]115-edna , [Robert]53-robert ? "[115-edna]

" Do n't go ; do n't go ! Oh ! [Edna]2121-edna , stay with [me]1620-me , "[1620-me] [he]1620-me pleaded . " Why should [you]2121-edna go ? Stay with [me]1620-me , stay with [me]1620-me . "[1620-me]

" [I]1621-her shall come back as soon as [I]1621-her can ; [I]1621-her shall find [you]1620-me here . "[1621-her] [She]1621-her buried [her]1621-her face in [his]1620-me neck , and said good - by again . [Her]1621-her seductive voice , together with [his]1620-me great love for [her]1621-her , had enthralled [his]1620-me senses , had deprived [him]1620-me of every impulse but the longing to hold [her]1621-her and keep [her]1621-her .

XXXVII

[Edna]115-edna looked in at [the drug store]1622-the drug store . [Monsieur Ratignolle]83-monsieur ratignolle was putting up a mixture [himself]83-monsieur ratignolle , very carefully , dropping a red liquid into a tiny glass . [He]83-monsieur ratignolle was grateful to [Edna]115-edna for having come ; [her]115-edna presence would be a comfort to [[his]83-monsieur ratignolle wife]179-his wife . [[Madame Ratignolle]62-madame ratignolle 's sister]1624-madame ratignolle 's sister , who had always been with [her]62-madame ratignolle at such trying times , had not been able to come up from [the plantation]1625-the plantation , and [Ad le]69-ad le had been inconsolable until [Mrs. Pontellier]52-mrs. pontellier so kindly promised to come to [her]1621-her . [The nurse]1626-the nurse had been with [them]1627-them at night for the past week , as [she]1626-the nurse lived a great distance away . And [Dr. Mandelet]141-mandelet had been coming and going all the afternoon . [They]1627-them were then looking for [him]141-mandelet any moment .

[Edna]115-edna hastened [upstairs]805-upstairs by a private stairway that led from the rear of [the store]988-the store to [the apartments above]1630-the apartments above . [The children]239-the children were all sleeping in [a back room]1632-a back room . [Madame Ratignolle]62-madame ratignolle was in [the salon]1000-the salon , whither [she]62-madame ratignolle had strayed in [her]62-madame ratignolle suffering impatience . [She]62-madame ratignolle sat on the sofa , clad in an ample white _ peignoir _ , holding a handkerchief tight in [her]62-madame ratignolle hand with a nervous clutch . [Her]62-madame ratignolle face was drawn and pinched , [her]62-madame ratignolle sweet blue eyes haggard and unnatural . All [her]62-madame ratignolle beautiful hair had been drawn back and plaited . It lay in a long braid on the sofa pillow , coiled like a golden serpent . [The nurse]1626-the nurse , [a comfortable looking Griffe woman in white apron and cap]1635-a comfortable looking griffe woman in white apron and cap , was urging [her]115-edna to return to [[her]115-edna bedroom]1469-her bedroom .

" There is no use , there is no use , "[1626-the nurse] [she]1626-the nurse said at once to [Edna]115-edna . " [We]2122-we must get rid of [Mandelet]141-mandelet ; [he]141-mandelet is getting too old and careless . [He]141-mandelet said [he]141-mandelet would be [here]1819-here at half - past seven ; now it must be eight . See what time it is , [Jos phine]104-joe . "[1626-the nurse]

[The woman]373-the woman was possessed of a cheerful nature , and refused to take any situation too seriously , especially a situation with which [she]373-the woman was so familiar . [She]373-the woman urged [Madame]62-madame ratignolle to have courage and patience . But [Madame]62-madame ratignolle only set [her]62-madame ratignolle teeth hard into [her]62-madame ratignolle under lip , and [Edna]115-edna saw the sweat gather in beads on [her]62-madame ratignolle white forehead . After a moment or two [she]115-edna uttered a profound sigh and wiped [her]115-edna face with the handkerchief rolled in a ball . [She]115-edna appeared exhausted . [The nurse]1626-the nurse gave [her]115-edna a fresh handkerchief , sprinkled with cologne water .

" This is too much ! "[1626-the nurse] [she]1626-the nurse cried . " [Mandelet]141-mandelet ought to be killed ! Where is [Alphonse]68-alphonse ? Is it possible [I]1626-the nurse am to be abandoned like this neglected by [every one]374-every one ? "[1626-the nurse]

" Neglected , indeed ! "[1626-the nurse] exclaimed [the nurse]1626-the nurse . Was n't [she]373-the woman there ? And here was [Mrs. Pontellier]52-mrs. pontellier leaving , no doubt , a pleasant evening at [home]245-home to devote to [her]373-the woman ? And was n't [Monsieur Ratignolle]83-monsieur ratignolle coming that very instant through [the hall]536-the hall ? And [Jos phine]104-joe was quite sure [she]1642-she had heard [Doctor Mandelet]120-doctor mandelet 's coup . Yes , there it was , down at the door .

[Ad le]69-ad le consented to go back to [[her]69-ad le room]224-her room . [She]69-ad le sat on the edge of [a little low couch next to [her]69-ad le bed]1644-a little low couch next to her bed .

[Doctor Mandelet]120-doctor mandelet paid no attention to [Madame Ratignolle]62-madame ratignolle 's upbraidings . [He]120-doctor mandelet was accustomed to [them]1645-them at such times , and was too well convinced of [her]69-ad le loyalty to doubt it .

[He]120-doctor mandelet was glad to see [Edna]115-edna , and wanted [her]115-edna to go with [him]120-doctor mandelet into [the salon]1000-the salon and entertain [him]120-doctor mandelet . But [Madame Ratignolle]62-madame ratignolle would not consent that [Edna]115-edna should leave [her]115-edna for an instant . Between agonizing moments , [she]115-edna chatted a little , and said it took [her]115-edna mind off [her]115-edna sufferings .

[Edna]115-edna began to feel uneasy . [She]115-edna was seized with a vague dread . [Her]115-edna own like experiences seemed far away , unreal , and only half remembered . [She]115-edna recalled faintly an ecstasy of pain , the heavy odor of chloroform , a stupor which had deadened sensation , and an awakening to find a little new life to which [she]115-edna had given being , added to the great unnumbered multitude of [souls that come and go]1647-souls that come and go .

[She]115-edna began to wish [she]115-edna had not come ; [her]115-edna presence was not necessary . [She]115-edna might have invented a pretext for staying away ; [she]115-edna might even invent a pretext now for going . But [Edna]115-edna did not go . With an inward agony , with a flaming , outspoken revolt against the ways of Nature , [she]115-edna witnessed the scene of torture .

[She]115-edna was still stunned and speechless with emotion when later [she]115-edna leaned over [[her]115-edna friend]346-her friend to kiss [her]346-her friend and softly say good - by . Ad le , pressing [her]115-edna cheek , whispered in an exhausted voice : " Think of [the children]239-the children , [Edna]115-edna . Oh think of [the children]239-the children ! Remember [them]239-the children ! "[115-edna]

XXXVIII

[Edna]115-edna still felt dazed when [she]115-edna got outside in the open air . [The Doctor]352-the doctor 's coup had returned for [him]352-the doctor and stood before [the _ porte coch re _]989-the _ porte coch re _ . [She]115-edna did not wish to enter the coup , and told [Doctor Mandelet]120-doctor mandelet [she]115-edna would walk ; [she]115-edna was not afraid , and would go alone . [He]120-doctor mandelet directed [[his]120-doctor mandelet carriage]1651-his carriage to meet [him]120-doctor mandelet at [[Mrs. Pontellier]52-mrs. pontellier 's]1652-mrs. pontellier 's , and [he]120-doctor mandelet started to walk [home]245-home with [her]115-edna .

Up away up , over [the narrow street]1654-the narrow street between [the tall houses]1655-the tall houses , the stars were blazing . The air was mild and caressing , but cool with the breath of spring and the night . [They]1656-they walked slowly , [the Doctor with a heavy , measured tread]1657-the doctor with a heavy , measured tread and [his]120-doctor mandelet hands behind [him]120-doctor mandelet ; [Edna]115-edna , in an absent - minded way , as [she]115-edna had walked one night at [Grand Isle]1-grand isle , as if [her]115-edna thoughts had gone ahead of [her]115-edna and [she]115-edna was striving to overtake [them]1658-them .

" [You]115-edna should n't have been [there]204-there , [Mrs. Pontellier]52-mrs. pontellier , "[120-doctor mandelet] [he]120-doctor mandelet said . " That was no place for [you]115-edna . [Ad le]69-ad le is full of whims at such times . There were [a dozen women [she]69-ad le might have had with [her]69-ad le]2128-a dozen women she might have had with her , [unimpressionable women]2129-unimpressionable women . [I]120-doctor mandelet felt that it was cruel , cruel . [You]115-edna should n't have gone . "[120-doctor mandelet]

" Oh , well ! "[115-edna] [she]115-edna answered , indifferently . " [I]115-edna do n't know that it matters after all . [One]303-one has to think of [the children]239-the children some time or other ; the sooner the better . "[115-edna]

" When is [L]57-l once coming back ? "[120-doctor mandelet]

" Quite soon . Some time in [March]45-march . "[115-edna]

" And [you]57-l are going abroad ? "[120-doctor mandelet]

" Perhaps no , [I]115-edna am not going . [I]115-edna 'm not going to be forced into doing things . [I]115-edna do n't want to go abroad . [I]115-edna want to be let alone . [Nobody]147-nobody has any right except [children]242-children , perhaps and even then , it seems to [me]115-edna or it did seem "[115-edna] [She]115-edna felt that [her]115-edna speech was voicing the incoherency of [her]115-edna thoughts , and stopped abruptly .

" The trouble is , "[352-the doctor] sighed [the Doctor]352-the doctor , grasping [her]115-edna meaning intuitively , " that [youth]2134-youth is given up to illusions . It seems to be a provision of Nature ; a decoy to secure [mothers]2135-mothers for the race . And Nature takes no account of moral consequences , of arbitrary conditions which [we]2136-we create , and which [we]2136-we feel obliged to maintain at any cost . "[352-the doctor]

" Yes , "[115-edna] [she]115-edna said . " The years that are gone seem like dreams if one might go on sleeping and dreaming but to wake up and find oh ! well ! perhaps it is better to wake up after all , even to suffer , rather than to remain [a dupe to illusions all one]2137-a dupe to illusions all one 's life . "[115-edna]

" It seems to [me]352-the doctor , [[my]352-the doctor dear child]2138-my dear child , "[352-the doctor] said [the Doctor]352-the doctor at parting , holding [her]115-edna hand , " [you]115-edna seem to [me]352-the doctor to be in trouble . [I]352-the doctor am not going to ask for [your]115-edna confidence . [I]352-the doctor will only say that if ever [you]115-edna feel moved to give it to [me]352-the doctor , perhaps [I]352-the doctor might help [you]115-edna . [I]352-the doctor know [I]352-the doctor would understand . And [I]352-the doctor tell [you]115-edna there are [not many who would not many]2139-not many who would not many , [[my]352-the doctor dear]1730-my dear . "[352-the doctor]

" Some way [I]115-edna do n't feel moved to speak of things that trouble [me]115-edna . Do n't think [I]115-edna am ungrateful or that [I]115-edna do n't appreciate [your]115-edna sympathy . There are periods of despondency and suffering which take possession of [me]115-edna . But [I]115-edna do n't want anything but [my]115-edna own way . That is wanting a good deal , of course , when [you]115-edna have to trample upon the lives , the hearts , the prejudices of [others]459-others but no matter still , [I]115-edna should n't want to trample upon the little lives . Oh ! [I]115-edna do n't know what [I]115-edna 'm saying , [Doctor]120-doctor mandelet . Good night . Do n't blame [me]115-edna for anything . "[115-edna]

" Yes , [I]352-the doctor will blame [you]115-edna if [you]115-edna do n't come and see [me]352-the doctor soon . [We]2142-we will talk of things [you]115-edna never have dreamt of talking about before . It will do [us]2142-we both good . [I]352-the doctor do n't want [you]115-edna to blame [yourself]115-edna , whatever comes . Good night , [[my]352-the doctor child]2143-my child . "[352-the doctor]

[She]1661-she let [herself]1661-she in at the gate , but instead of entering [she]1661-she sat upon the step of [the porch]182-the porch . The night was quiet and soothing . All the tearing emotion of the last few hours seemed to fall away from [her]1661-she like a somber , uncomfortable garment , which [she]1661-she had but to loosen to be rid of . [She]1661-she went back to that hour before [Ad le]69-ad le had sent for [her]1661-she ; and [her]1661-she senses kindled afresh in thinking of [Robert]53-robert 's words , the pressure of [his]53-robert arms , and the feeling of [his]53-robert lips upon [her]1661-she own . [She]1661-she could picture at that moment no greater bliss on earth than possession of [the beloved one]1437-the beloved one . [His]53-robert expression of love had already given [him]53-robert to [her]1661-she in part . When [she]1661-she thought that [he]53-robert was there at hand , waiting for [her]1661-she , [she]1661-she grew numb with the intoxication of expectancy . It was so late ; [he]53-robert would be asleep perhaps . [She]1661-she would awaken [him]53-robert with a kiss . [She]1661-she hoped [he]53-robert would be asleep that [she]1661-she might arouse [him]53-robert with [her]1661-she caresses .

Still , [she]1661-she remembered [Ad le]69-ad le 's voice whispering , " Think of [the children]239-the children ; think of [them]1664-them . "[69-ad le] [She]1661-she meant to think of [them]1664-them ; that determination had driven into [her]1661-she soul like a death wound but not to - night . To - morrow would be time to think of everything .

[Robert]53-robert was not waiting for [her]1661-she in [the little parlor]1665-the little parlor . [He]53-robert was nowhere at hand . [The house]157-the house was empty . But [he]53-robert had scrawled on a piece of paper that lay in the lamplight :

" [I]53-robert love [you]115-edna . Good - by because [I]53-robert love [you]115-edna . "[53-robert]

[Edna]115-edna grew faint when [she]115-edna read the words . [She]115-edna went and sat on the sofa . Then [she]115-edna stretched [herself]115-edna out there , never uttering a sound . [She]115-edna did not sleep . [She]115-edna did not go to bed . The lamp sputtered and went out . [She]115-edna was still awake in the morning , when [Celestine]129-celestine unlocked the kitchen door and came in to light the fire .

XXXIX

[Victor]78-victor , with hammer and nails and scraps of scantling , was patching a corner of [one of [the galleries]687-the galleries]1667-one of the galleries . [Mariequita]90-mariequita sat near by , dangling [her]90-mariequita legs , watching [him]78-victor work , and handing [him]78-victor nails from the tool - box . The sun was beating down upon [them]1669-them . [The girl]698-the girl had covered [her]698-the girl head with [her]698-the girl apron folded into a square pad . [They]1669-them had been talking for an hour or more . [She]90-mariequita was never tired of hearing [Victor]78-victor describe the dinner at [[Mrs. Pontellier]52-mrs. pontellier 's]1652-mrs. pontellier 's . [He]78-victor exaggerated every detail , making it appear a veritable Lucullean feast . The flowers were in tubs , [he]78-victor said . The champagne was quaffed from huge golden goblets . [Venus]142-venus rising from the foam could have presented no more entrancing a spectacle than [Mrs. Pontellier]52-mrs. pontellier , blazing with beauty and diamonds at the head of the board , while [the other women]1672-the other women were all of [them]1672-the other women youthful houris , possessed of incomparable charms . [She]90-mariequita got it into [her]90-mariequita head that [Victor]78-victor was in love with [Mrs. Pontellier]52-mrs. pontellier , and [he]78-victor gave [her]90-mariequita evasive answers , framed so as to confirm [her]90-mariequita belief . [She]90-mariequita grew sullen and cried a little , threatening to go off and leave [him]78-victor to [[his]78-victor fine ladies]1673-his fine ladies . There were [a dozen men crazy about [her]90-mariequita at [the _ Ch ni re]200-the _ ch ni re]1674-a dozen men crazy about her at the _ ch ni re ; _ and since it was the fashion to be in love with [married people]1676-married people , why , [she]90-mariequita could run away any time [she]90-mariequita liked to [New Orleans]2-new orleans with [[C lina]143-c lina 's husband]1677-c lina 's husband .

[[C lina]143-c lina 's husband]1677-c lina 's husband was [a fool]1679-a fool , [a coward]1680-a coward , and a pig , and to prove it to [her]90-mariequita , [Victor]78-victor intended to hammer [his]78-victor head into a jelly the next time [he]78-victor encountered [him]78-victor . This assurance was very consoling to [Mariequita]90-mariequita . [She]90-mariequita dried [her]90-mariequita eyes , and grew cheerful at the prospect .

[They]1681-they were still talking of the dinner and the allurements of [city]1682-city life when [Mrs. Pontellier]52-mrs. pontellier [herself]52-mrs. pontellier slipped around the corner of [the house]157-the house . [The two youngsters]1684-the two youngsters stayed dumb with amazement before what [they]1684-the two youngsters considered to be [an apparition]1685-an apparition . But it was really [she]52-mrs. pontellier in flesh and blood , looking tired and a little travel - stained .

" [I]52-mrs. pontellier walked up from [the wharf]260-the wharf , "[52-mrs. pontellier] [she]52-mrs. pontellier said , " and heard the hammering . [I]52-mrs. pontellier supposed it was [you]78-victor , mending [the porch]182-the porch . It 's a good thing . [I]52-mrs. pontellier was always tripping over those loose planks last summer . How dreary and deserted everything looks ! "[52-mrs. pontellier]

It took [Victor]78-victor some little time to comprehend that [she]52-mrs. pontellier had come in [[Beaudelet]51-beaudelet 's lugger]1686-beaudelet 's lugger , that [she]52-mrs. pontellier had come alone , and for no purpose but to rest .

" There 's nothing fixed up yet , [you]78-victor see . [I]52-mrs. pontellier 'll give [you]78-victor [[my]52-mrs. pontellier room]2147-my room ; it 's the only place . "[52-mrs. pontellier]

" [Any corner]2148-any corner will do , "[52-mrs. pontellier] [she]52-mrs. pontellier assured [him]78-victor .

" And if [you]78-victor can stand [Philomel]144-philomel 's cooking , "[78-victor] [he]78-victor went on , " though [I]78-victor might try to get [[her]144-philomel mother]2149-her mother while [you]78-victor are [here]1819-here . Do [you]78-victor think [she]2149-her mother would come ? "[78-victor] turning to [Mariequita]90-mariequita .

[Mariequita]90-mariequita thought that perhaps [[Philomel]144-philomel 's mother]1687-philomel 's mother might come for a few days , and money enough .

Beholding [Mrs. Pontellier]52-mrs. pontellier make [her]52-mrs. pontellier appearance , [the girl]698-the girl had at once suspected [a lovers]1689-a lovers ' rendezvous . But [Victor]78-victor 's astonishment was so genuine , and [Mrs. Pontellier]52-mrs. pontellier 's indifference so apparent , that the disturbing notion did not lodge long in [her]90-mariequita brain . [She]90-mariequita contemplated with the greatest interest [this woman who gave the most sumptuous dinners in [America]46-america]1690-this woman who gave the most sumptuous dinners in america , and who had [all the men in [New Orleans]2-new orleans]1691-all the men in new orleans at [her]1690-this woman who gave the most sumptuous dinners in america feet .

" What time will [you]78-victor have dinner ? "[115-edna] asked [Edna]115-edna . " [I]115-edna 'm very hungry ; but do n't get anything extra . "[115-edna]

" [I]78-victor 'll have it ready in little or no time , "[78-victor] [he]78-victor said , bustling and packing away [his]78-victor tools . " [You]115-edna may go to [[my]78-victor room]2147-my room to brush up and rest [yourself]115-edna . [Mariequita]90-mariequita will show [you]78-victor . "[78-victor]

" Thank [you]78-victor , "[115-edna] said [Edna]115-edna . " But , do [you]78-victor know , [I]115-edna have a notion to go down to [the beach]175-the beach and take a good wash and even a little swim , before dinner ? "[115-edna]

" [The water]188-the water is too cold ! "[1692-they] [they]1692-they both exclaimed . " Do n't think of it . "[1692-they]

" Well , [I]90-mariequita might go down and try dip [my]90-mariequita toes in . Why , it seems to [me]90-mariequita the sun is hot enough to have warmed [the very depths of [the ocean]1735-the ocean]2154-the very depths of the ocean . Could [you]78-victor get [me]90-mariequita a couple of towels ? [I]90-mariequita 'd better go right away , so as to be back in time . It would be a little too chilly if [I]90-mariequita waited till this afternoon . "[90-mariequita]

[Mariequita]90-mariequita ran over to [[Victor]78-victor 's room]1693-victor 's room , and returned with some towels , which [she]90-mariequita gave to [Edna]115-edna .

" [I]115-edna hope [you]78-victor have fish for dinner , "[115-edna] said [Edna]115-edna , as [she]115-edna started to walk away ; " but do n't do anything extra if [you]78-victor have n't . "[115-edna]

" Run and find [[Philomel]144-philomel 's mother]1687-philomel 's mother , "[78-victor] [Victor]78-victor instructed [the girl]698-the girl . " [I]78-victor 'll go to [the kitchen]504-the kitchen and see what [I]78-victor can do . By Gimminy ! [Women]635-women have no consideration ! [She]1687-philomel 's mother might have sent [me]78-victor word . "[78-victor]

[Edna]115-edna walked on down to [the beach]175-the beach rather mechanically , not noticing anything special except that the sun was hot . [She]115-edna was not dwelling upon any particular train of thought . [She]115-edna had done all the thinking which was necessary after [Robert]53-robert went away , when [she]115-edna lay awake upon the sofa till morning .

[She]115-edna had said over and over to [herself]115-edna : " To - day it is [Arobin]77-arobin ; to - morrow it will be [some one else]2159-some one else . It makes no difference to [me]115-edna , it does n't matter about [L]57-l once [Pontellier]49-mr. pontellier but [Raoul]58-raoul and [Etienne]99-etienne ! "[115-edna] [She]115-edna understood now clearly what [she]115-edna had meant long ago when [she]115-edna said to [Ad le Ratignolle]69-ad le that [she]115-edna would give up the unessential , but [she]115-edna would never sacrifice [herself]115-edna for [[her]115-edna children]306-her children .

Despondency had come upon [her]115-edna [there]204-there in the wakeful night , and had never lifted . There was no one thing in [the world]281-the world that [she]115-edna desired . There was [no human being whom [she]115-edna wanted near [her]115-edna except [Robert]53-robert]1699-no human being whom she wanted near her except robert ; and [she]115-edna even realized that the day would come when [he]53-robert , too , and the thought of [him]53-robert would melt out of [her]115-edna existence , leaving [her]115-edna alone . [The children]239-the children appeared before [her]115-edna like antagonists who had overcome [her]115-edna ; who had overpowered and sought to drag [her]115-edna into the soul 's slavery for the rest of [her]115-edna days . But [she]115-edna knew a way to elude [them]239-the children . [She]115-edna was not thinking of these things when [she]115-edna walked down to [the beach]175-the beach .

[The water of [the Gulf]15-the gulf]1702-the water of the gulf stretched out before [her]115-edna , gleaming with the million lights of the sun . The voice of [the sea]253-the sea is seductive , never ceasing , whispering , clamoring , murmuring , inviting the soul to wander in abysses of solitude . All along [the white beach]1704-the white beach , up and down , there was no living thing in sight . [A bird with a broken wing]1705-a bird with a broken wing was beating the air above , reeling , fluttering , circling disabled down , down to [the water]188-the water .

[Edna]115-edna had found [her]115-edna old bathing suit still hanging , faded , upon its accustomed peg .

[She]115-edna put it on , leaving [her]115-edna clothing in [the bath - house]486-the bath - house . But when [she]115-edna was there beside [the sea]253-the sea , absolutely alone , [she]115-edna cast the unpleasant , pricking garments from [her]115-edna , and for the first time in [her]115-edna life [she]115-edna stood naked in the open air , at the mercy of the sun , the breeze that beat upon [her]115-edna , and the waves that invited [her]115-edna .

How strange and awful it seemed to stand naked under the sky ! how delicious ! [She]115-edna felt like some new - born creature , opening its eyes in a familiar world that it had never known .

The foamy wavelets curled up to [her]115-edna white feet , and coiled like serpents about [her]115-edna ankles . [She]115-edna walked out . [The water]188-the water was chill , but [she]115-edna walked on . [The water]188-the water was deep , but [she]115-edna lifted [her]115-edna white body and reached out with a long , sweeping stroke . The touch of [the sea]253-the sea is sensuous , enfolding the body in its soft , close embrace .

[She]115-edna went on and on . [She]115-edna remembered the night [she]115-edna swam far out , and recalled the terror that seized [her]115-edna at the fear of being unable to regain [the shore]643-the shore . [She]115-edna did not look back now , but went on and on , thinking of the blue - grass meadow that [she]115-edna had traversed when [a little child , believing that it had no beginning and no end]1713-a little child , believing that it had no beginning and no end .

[Her]115-edna arms and legs were growing tired .

[She]115-edna thought of [L]57-l once and [the children]239-the children . [They]1715-they were a part of [her]115-edna life . But [they]1715-they need not have thought that [they]1715-they could possess [her]115-edna , body and soul . How [Mademoiselle Reisz]84-mademoiselle reisz would have laughed , perhaps sneered , if [she]84-mademoiselle reisz knew ! " And [you]115-edna call [yourself]115-edna [an artist]1765-an artist ! What pretensions , [Madame]62-madame ratignolle ! [The artist]1925-the artist must possess the courageous soul that dares and defies . "[84-mademoiselle reisz]

[Exhaustion]145-exhaustion was pressing upon and overpowering [her]115-edna .

" Good - by because [I]1716-he love [you]115-edna . "[1716-he] [He]1716-he did not know ; [he]1716-he did not understand . [He]1716-he would never understand . Perhaps [Doctor Mandelet]120-doctor mandelet would have understood if [she]115-edna had seen [him]1716-he but it was too late ; [the shore]643-the shore was far behind [her]115-edna , and [her]115-edna strength was gone .

[She]115-edna looked into the distance , and the old terror flamed up for an instant , then sank again . [Edna]115-edna heard [[her]115-edna father]211-her father 's voice and [[her]115-edna sister]463-her sister [Margaret]71-margaret 's . [She]115-edna heard the barking of an old dog that was chained to the sycamore tree . The spurs of [the cavalry officer]445-the cavalry officer clanged as [he]445-the cavalry officer walked across [the porch]182-the porch . There was the hum of bees , and the musky odor of pinks filled the air .
